Uses of Interface
org.strongback.components.ThreeAxisAccelerometer

  • Packages that use ThreeAxisAccelerometer 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.
    org.strongback.hardware  

    • Uses of ThreeAxisAccelerometer in org.strongback.components

      Methods in org.strongback.components that return ThreeAxisAccelerometer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ThreeAxisAccelerometer ThreeAxisAccelerometer.create(Accelerometer xAxis, Accelerometer yAxis, Accelerometer zAxis)
      Create a 3-axis accelerometer from the three individual accelerometers.
      static ThreeAxisAccelerometer ThreeAxisAccelerometer.create(TwoAxisAccelerometer xAndY, Accelerometer zAxis)
      Create a 3-axis accelerometer from a 2-axis accelerometer and a separate accelerometer for the Z-axis.

    • Uses of ThreeAxisAccelerometer in org.strongback.hardware

      Methods in org.strongback.hardware that return ThreeAxisAccelerometer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ThreeAxisAccelerometer Hardware.Accelerometers.accelerometer(I2C.Port port, Accelerometer.Range range)
      Create a new ThreeAxisAccelerometer for the ADXL345 with the desired range using the specified I2C port.
      static ThreeAxisAccelerometer Hardware.Accelerometers.accelerometer(SPI.Port port, Accelerometer.Range range)
      Create a new ThreeAxisAccelerometer for the ADXL345 with the desired range using the specified SPI port.
      static ThreeAxisAccelerometer Hardware.Accelerometers.builtIn()
      Create a new ThreeAxisAccelerometer using the RoboRIO's built-in accelerometer.
